duties_responsibilities.duty: Applying general environmental principles, theories, and concepts to assignments such as reviewing and reporting environmental incidents.
Conducting and/or observing soil sampling for remediation projects.
Observing engine emission tests and submitting final test reports to the appropriate agency.
Researching pending and/or current environmental regulations.
Conducting statistical analysis and trending on company data (i.e. spills, leak detection, etc.).

education_certification.credential: Full time student pursuing degree in Environmental Science, Environmental Engineering, or any other Engineering or Science related disciplines.
